channel.title: Make npcs face a direction on delta
channel.description:
Helo can anyone tell me how do i make it so that npcs face a specific direction.. on delta/xscape source Please post here thanks help will be appreciaited..
Thanks

item.title: Make npcs face a direction on delta

@ats3 wrote:

That’s probably possible. You can’t do it. Although you can make them move and they will face the direction they moved.
